name: The Pitcher Inn & Restaurant
notes: Upscale food and ambience, you can choose white-linen dinner service or a more relaxed bar atmosphere in Tracks Bar.
Great place to bring a date or go out for an occasion, say hi to Lucas at the bar.

name: Localfolk Smokehouse
notes: The best dive-bar in the Mad River Valley
Cheap drink and a few pool-tables, I wouldn't go here on a first date.

name: Lawson's Finest Liquids
notes: If you havn't enjoyed a Lawson's beverage, you should.
Nice spot for an apres-ski drink or to hang-out on an evening.

name: Hyde-Away Restaurant
notes: Great burgers and fish tacos on tuesdays, good prices

name: Canteen Creemee Company
notes: Best most creative creemees in Vermont.

name: American-Flatbread
notes: Seriously good flatbread pizza made fresh in the hearth
